extendedInfo.description: Budget Travel Ultimate Road Trips is a guide to more than 70 of our country's most inspiring drives. From sea-sprayed coastlines to rambling country roads, we give you plenty of reasons to fill up your gas tank. We've also scouted out the best places to eat, see and stay along the wayâand plotted them all on a map with GPS functionality so all you have to do is drive. You're welcome.â¢	Select a trip by region or your current locationâ¢	See your mapped route, plus get turn-by-turn directionsâ¢	Discover our favorite hotels, restaurants, and must-see points of interest including museums, campsites, national and state parks, and more â with descriptive info, address, website, and click-to-callâ¢	Read the full article for more infoâ¢	Share trips with your friendsâ¢	Save your favorites for later

reviews.title: Slow, force closes
reviews.comment: App has potential, but kept crashing.  I closed everything out, cleared memory, turned power to phone off.  Turned back on but had same results. It was slow to load screens on 4g, so since I have a fast wifi, I switched to that but had same results. I was disappointed.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: Back roads all the way shouldnt be a problem now!!! :)
reviews.author: Tina Louise

reviews.title: Budget Travel by Crap-oil
reviews.comment: I thought I\'d just give this a 5 to be the first five, but this is TRULY horrible! Says 14mb but loads as 20.56mb. Great design, great intentions, but app is so massive it just doesn\'t work! Doesn\'t allow transfering to sd, so dont try it!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nothing special.
reviews.comment: Web sites do the same thing,  better.

reviews.comment: Couldnt test the app ithout it crashing. At ne point it said i had slow connection so it shutdown

reviews.title: Lousy app...
reviews.comment: Same comments as most of these reviews; crashes, slow, poorly produced.  It\'s a shame too, because it\'s a good idea
reviews.author: Jim Hoyt

reviews.title: Early development of App; programming bugs present
reviews.comment: The App appears in the early stages of development on my Samsung 4G Infuse Android phone and should probably not have been released at this point since it will likely receive additional negative feedback. There is great potential here. Photos, maps, places to visit, good spots to eat are present. I would really like to see the App developed. It operated slowly and I had several crashes. When working, the articles appeared overwritten at one point. I went to search for the rocky mountain and ended up with what appeared to be Rocky Mountain Nat\'l Park overwritten by Olympic park and a picture of Hurricane Ridge (I think - not sure because I could not read the caption). The program is VERY frustrating at this point but again very good potential; would love to be able to rate it a 4 or 5 soon. App has been uninstalled.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good. But wasn\'t what I was looking for.
reviews.comment: I was looking for an app that I could put my route into and it would tell me about deals along the way along with gas prices etc. This is good for someone looking to seriously travel and see more than a beach and a hotel lol.
